page.title: 17RECREATION - GLOUCESTER
page.content: ANGLING IS THE MOST POPULAR PASTIME AS THE SEVERN AND CANAL PROVIDE A VARIETY OF FISH INCLUDING SALMON. THE ROWING CLUB AT HEMPSTED HAS A REGATTA WHICH ATTRACTS WEST AND MIDLANDS CREWS. COUNTY CRICKET IS PLAYED AT THE GROUND IN TUFFLEY AVENUE AND THE CITY CLUB PLAY AT THE SPA GROUND. GLOUCESTER HAS MANY RUGBY CLUBS DUE TO THE SUCCESS OF THE CITY RUGBY TEAM. SOCCER IS PLAYED AT HORTON ROAD. BOWLING CLUBS ARE WELL SUPPORTED AND PUBLIC GREENS ARE AT THE SPA. THE LEISURE CENTRE OFFERS SWIMMING AND HOSTS IMPORTANT GALAS AND A.B.A. BOXING TOURNAMENTS BESIDES SQUASH, ARCHERY AND MARTIAL ARTS. THE LOCAL PENTATHLON TEAM REGULARLY PROVIDE OLYMPIC PENTATHLETES. A LOCAL HOCKEY LEAGUE EXISTS AND THE ATHLETICS TEAM COMPETES IN NATIONAL EVENTS.
